benchmark_details.name: MEQA (Meta-Evaluation Framework for Question & Answer LLM Benchmarks)
benchmark_details.overview: MEQA is a framework for the meta-evaluation of question and answer (QA) benchmarks, providing standardized assessments, quantifiable scores, and enabling meaningful intra-benchmark comparisons.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a framework for the meta-evaluation of QA benchmarks in order to assess their quality and effectiveness.

data.annotation: Scores given by human and LLM evaluators based on defined criteria.

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated on a scale from 1 to 5 for each sub-criterion.
methodology.interpretation: Scores reflect the effectiveness of benchmarks in various meta-evaluation criteria.
methodology.baseline_results: Scores from evaluated benchmarks as listed in Table 2.
methodology.validation: Evaluation agreed upon by multiple human evaluators.
